hero.title: Beyazıt Barutçu
hero.description: Creative and detail-oriented developer with a passion for building intelligent systems, combining software engineering, research, and design to create thoughtful, user-focused, and technically sound solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Creative developer with a passion for building interactive and visually stunning digital experiences.
about.bioP1: I’m a computer engineer with a focus on building practical and scalable technology solutions. My background includes experience in software development, automation, and data-driven systems.
about.bioP2: I approach each project with a balance of analytical thinking and collaborative mindset—ensuring that solutions are not only functional but also align with real-world needs.
about.bioP3: Adaptable and curious by nature, I follow emerging technologies closely and enjoy working in environments where knowledge-sharing and joint effort lead to better outcomes.

current.title: Freelance Computer Engineer
current.description: Since 2024, I’ve been actively working on freelance software projects, developing custom solutions across different needs and platforms. In parallel, I continue to support my family’s business operations, contributing to both daily workflows and broader problem-solving efforts.

previous1.title: Computer Engineer Intern
previous1.company: GANİ OTOMASYON MÜHENDİSLİK SAN. VE TİC. A.Ş.
previous1.description: Completed a internship at Gani Otomasyon, where I took part in the early development of intelligent monitoring solutions within an industrial setting. Actively contributed to the design and testing of camera-based systems aimed at improving operational awareness and efficiency.

bachelors.description: Core curriculum in programming, algorithms, data structures, and software development methodologies.

courses.description: Continuous learning through specialized courses in emerging web technologies, data visualization, and machine learning.

portfolio.title: My Work
portfolio.subtitle: Here you can find a selection of my projects showcasing practical solutions and diverse technical skills.
portfolio.insightDescription: Explore my portfolio through an interactive network of ideas, projects, and technologies. Each node reveals a key part of my journey, from core skills to creative experiments.

neuralNetwork.title: Personal Website
neuralNetwork.description: A curated showcase of my projects, reflecting a blend of technical depth and visual sophistication—designed to engage and inspire through interactive and modern presentations.
neuralNetwork.details: This portfolio website is built with React and D3.js, featuring interactive visualizations like force-directed graphs and real-time particle systems. It supports multilingual functionality using react-i18next and employs Tailwind CSS with custom themes for responsive and consistent design. Animations and interactions are optimized through requestAnimationFrame and efficient SVG manipulations for smooth user experience.

main.label: Me
main.title: About Me
main.subtitle: A Journey Through Code, Design, and Discovery
main.description: I’m a developer with a multidisciplinary mindset, combining software engineering, AI, and design thinking to create purposeful, intelligent systems. My work is rooted in curiosity, continuous learning, and the drive to build tools that both solve real problems and inspire new ideas. This node connects the dots across everything I do — from education and skills to research and creative projects.

frontend.label: Frontend
frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.subtitle: Building modern, responsive user interfaces
frontend.description:
I specialize in crafting modern frontend experiences using the latest web technologies. My approach focuses on creating responsive, accessible, and performant interfaces that work across all devices.

My expertise includes modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Vue.js, along with advanced CSS techniques including animations, Grid, and Flexbox layouts. I prioritize creating semantic markup and accessible interfaces that work for all users.

design.label: Design
design.title: UI/UX Design
design.subtitle: Creating intuitive and appealing user experiences
design.description:
My design philosophy centers on creating intuitive, accessible, and aesthetically pleasing interfaces. I bridge the gap between visual design and technical implementation to ensure a cohesive user experience.

Working with tools like Figma and Adobe Creative Suite, I create design systems, prototypes, and visual assets that bring ideas to life. I'm particularly interested in creating designs that aren't just beautiful, but also practical and implementable.

backend.label: Backend
backend.title: Backend Development
backend.subtitle: Building robust server-side solutions
backend.description:
I develop scalable backend systems that power modern web applications. My focus is on creating clean, maintainable APIs and efficient database designs that support the frontend experience.

While my primary expertise is in frontend development, I'm comfortable working across the full stack, which helps me create more integrated solutions and better understand system architecture as a whole.

animation.label: Animation
animation.title: Web Animation
animation.subtitle: Creating engaging motion experiences
animation.description:
I create smooth, purposeful animations that enhance user experience and bring interfaces to life. Focusing on performance and accessibility, I implement animations that guide users, provide feedback, and add delight without being distracting.

My toolkit includes CSS animations, JavaScript animation libraries, SVG animation, and WebGL for more complex 3D effects when appropriate.

bachelors.label: Education
bachelors.title: Education
bachelors.subtitle: Uludag University Computer Engineering Bachelor's Degree
bachelors.description: The formal education I received in computer engineering provided me with a solid foundation in algorithms, data structures, and applied artificial intelligence, and in light of the theoretical knowledge I gained, I have developed a broader perspective in this field.

courses.label: Online Courses
courses.title: Continuous Learning
courses.subtitle: Professional development through online education
courses.description:
I believe in lifelong learning and regularly take online courses to stay current with emerging technologies and design trends.

These specialized courses have helped me deepen my expertise in areas like advanced animation techniques, data visualization, and modern frontend frameworks.

ai.label: AI & ML
ai.title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
ai.subtitle: Developing a foundation in intelligent systems
ai.description: AI is where my curiosity and technical interest intersect. I’m drawn to how machines learn, adapt, and uncover patterns—pushing me to experiment with models, tools, and ideas that challenge my understanding and fuel my growth as a developer.

freelance.label: Freelance
freelance.title: Freelance Projects
freelance.subtitle: Exploring and building through real work
freelance.description: Freelance work has been a way for me to stay hands-on, grow through real-world challenges, and explore my passion for software development in diverse contexts.

vision.label: Vision
vision.title: Career Goals & Focus
vision.subtitle: Growing through data, design, and real-world impact
vision.description: I'm building a career at the intersection of software development and data science, with a strong interest in turning complex information into actionable insights. In the long term, I aim to contribute to impactful tech-driven projects, while continuously developing my skills in machine learning, system design, and collaborative development environments.
